attributes.action: Please remove Wayne pivac and bring back Warren Gatland & Shaun Edwards.
attributes.additional_details: Enforce the removal of Wayne Pivac and enforce Warren Gatland to assume command of wales rugby side with Sean Edwards. I’m sure that the WRU will Approve of this.
attributes.background: Since Warren Gatland has left and handed over to Wayne Pivac, wales have not shown the fire they had. Therefore management are at fault. We also need the help of Shaun Edwards. He does not need to help the french win the grand slam or any further competitions.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
